Articles.Content: my Scott Manley Impersonation... I think I sound quite good!

do you have... any kind of video to show it?

Maybe an Ace of fours or something?
Yes we need to hear this, you can't just reveal a talent of impersonating him and then not let the world hear it.
I bet I am not the only one who cannot help them say "Hello I'm Scott Manley" in their best impersonation voice... am I?

I think Scott Manley and Joe Hills should do a lets play together just saying... but yes lets hear it.
